summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 27, 2019. It includes inmate count sheets, rosters, and assignment logs, with one roster specifically noting an attorney visit for inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster with a scheduled attorney visit on July 27, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein's Attorney Visit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein had a scheduled attorney visit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count
events.description: Routine inmate population counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, showing a total population of 767 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 27, 2019.
An inmate roster shows Epstein (REG NO 76318-054) had a scheduled attorney visit (assignment: ATTY) on that date.
The total inmate population at MCC New York on July 27, 2019, was recorded as 767 during a routine count.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for inmate counts, rosters, and assignments.
The date of these records is approximately three weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
